queries.query:
from(bucket: "LOGGER")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "minicurrent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "voltage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["tag"] == "ch1" or r["tag"] == "ch2" or r["tag"] == "ch3" or r["tag"] == "ch4")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1ms, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "LOGGER")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "minicurrent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["tag"] == "ch1" or r["tag"] == "ch2" or r["tag"] == "ch3" or r["tag"] == "ch4")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "current")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1ms, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "LOGGER")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "currentlogger")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "current")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["tag"] == "currentch1")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "LOGGER")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "minicurrent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["tag"] == "ch1" or r["tag"] == "ch2" or r["tag"] == "ch3" or r["tag"] == "ch4")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "power")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1ms, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "LOGGER")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "minicurrent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["tag"] == "ch1" or r["tag"] == "ch2" or r["tag"] == "ch3" or r["tag"] == "ch4")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bat")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")
